value.title: Goldman Sachs to Offer Its Investing Know-How to the Masses
value.excerpt: The Wall Street firm is set to unveil Marcus Invest, a low-cost digital platform that allocates and automatically rebalances individuals’ wealth across portfolios of stocks and bonds based on the models developed by the firm’s investment-strategy committee.

value.title: Data meets science: Open access, code, datasets, and knowledge graphs for machine learning research and beyond
value.excerpt: An new interconnected ecosystem for research is shaping up, and machine learning is just the tip of the iceberg.

value.title: Semeon Analytics Wins Major Artificial Intelligence Contract with U.S. Military
value.excerpt: Semeon Analytics, an ATW Tech Inc. company, is pleased to announce its most recent contract with a branch of the U.S. military to apply its technology to better understand how complex composite materials can fail and therefore facilitate the development of processes that safeguard components assembled with these new materials.

value.title: Tickeron Releases AI Trading Robots with Trailing Stops
value.excerpt: Tickeron, an artificial and human intelligence platform delivering unparalleled trading insights and analysis, launched its new AI Robots tool for setting trailing stops for cryptos and stocks. "AI Robots" are automated trading rooms where AI makes trades based on several neural networks.

value.title: Lemonade adds Bestow's AI-powered life insurance in cross-selling move
value.excerpt: Lemonade added Bestow's term life insurance coverage, which may help its latest offering stand out from traditional term life coverage.

value.title: Gov. DeSantis, Education Commissioner announce Florida Pathways to Career Opportunities grant awardees
value.excerpt: The $10 million is awarded to school districts, colleges, state universities, and private training entities to start or expand registered apprenticeship and pre-apprenticeship programs throughout the state.

value.title: Vevo Launches AI-Driven ‘Moods’ To Target Ads To Attitudes
value.excerpt: Vevo launches Moods, an artificial-intelligence tool that groups music videos into specific moods to improve the targeting of ads that run alongside them. Four Moods will be initially available, with more to come in the future.

value.title: Bearing.ai emerges from stealth to power recommendations for shipping boat captains
value.excerpt: Bearing.ai provides the maritime shipping industry with predictive recommendations and launches with support from AI Fund and Mitsui & Co.

value.title: Robot Artist Ai-Da Presents Her First Art Exhibition
value.excerpt: The world's first robot artist is set to have her first exhibition in London's Design Museum. The exhibition, Ai-Da Self Portraits is to open in May 2021 and will present three large scale self-portraits.

value.title: Most Indian firms to turn to AI for decision-making by 2023
value.excerpt: Over 40 per cent of consumer-focused AI systems in finance, healthcare, government and other regulated sectors in India will include provisions to explain their analysis and decisions by 2023, a new IDC report said on Tuesday.

value.title: Ai-Da, the first robot artist to be exhibiting herself
value.excerpt: The robot was named Ai-Da after the 19th century mathematician Ada Lovelace. According to its creators, it is capable of drawing real people using its camera eye and a pencil in hand. She 'looks' in the mirror that is integrated with her camera eyes and with the help of algorithm programs transforms it into coordinates.

value.title: IBM’s hybrid cloud strategy is gaining steam
